p: Upon treatment with 20 μm A β 25–35 for 48h, SH-SY5Y cells displayed ∼50% viability compared to control. Pretreatment of SH-SY5Y cells with the SFP and the SFD extracts managed to significantly reduce the A β 25–35 toxic effects and partly rescued cell viability ( Figure 3). The most prominent effect was observed with the SFP extract, which at 20 μg/mL restored cell viability at ∼75% of control cells and at 50 μg/mL restored cell viability at ∼69% of control cells. At 2 μg/mL, the SFP extract showed a trend to rescue cell viability, while at 100 μg/mL the toxic effects of SFP dropped cell viability to almost zero.
